EXTENDED_LINE_1: **{{prefix}}setevents channel [#Channel]** ~ Sets the default event advertisement channel.
EXTENDED_LINE_2: **{{prefix}}setevents removechannel** ~ Disables the default event advertisement channel.
ALIASES: Setevents does not have any aliases.
NEED_CHANNEL: You did not provide a channel to use as the default event advertisement channel.
SET_ADCHANNEL: The default event advertisement channel has been set to {{channel}}.
RESET_ADCHANNEL: The default event advertisement channel has been removed.
NEED_ROLE: You did not provide a role. In order to set the role required to create events on this server, you must provide a valid role.
SET_ROLE: The role required to create events on this server has been set.
RESET_ROLE: The role required to create events on this server has been removed. Only mods or admins will be able to make events now.
